amendment.description: An amendment numbered 75 printed in Part A of House Report 118-261 to prohibit the Director of the Bureau of Land Management from taking any action to finalize, implement, or enforce a draft resource management plan and draft supplemental environmental impact statement to end new oil leases on 1.6M acres in Colorado.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A027) Agreed to by voice vote.
